#summary sizeData Binary Data Field

= sizeData Binary Data Field =


Specifies the size in bytes of the [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemExtentEntry_Offset Offset] field, [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemExtentEntry_Length Length] field, and [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemLocationEntry_BaseOffset BaseOffset] field, respectively. These values must be from the set {0, 4, 8}.

*Serialization Namespace:*  [Bin_N_MP4 MP4]<br>*Assembly:*  MP4 (in MP4.dll)
== Data Serialization ==

=== Field Value ===
Type: *UInt16* — a 16-bit (2 bytes) unsigned integer <br>
The box starts with three values, specifying the size in bytes:

 * _!OffsetSize_<br> Type: *Int4* — an 4-bit integer<br> Taken from the set {0, 4, 8} and indicates the length in bytes of the [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemExtentEntry_Offset Offset] field.
 * _!LengthSize_<br> Type: *Int4* — an 4-bit integer<br> Taken from the set {0, 4, 8} and indicates the length in bytes of the [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemExtentEntry_Length Length] field.
 * _!BaseOffsetSize_<br> Type: *Int4* — an 4-bit integer<br> Taken from the set {0, 4, 8} and indicates the length in bytes of the [Bin_F_MP4_ISOMediaBoxes_ItemLocationEntry_BaseOffset BaseOffset] field.
 * _Reserved_<br> Type: *Int4* — an 4-bit integer<br> Reserved. Set to 0.
